Class MediaTaskDAO

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FBTaskDAO, PhotoTaskDAO, VideoTaskDAO

    public abstract class MediaTaskDAO
extends TaskDAO
    Abstract base class for tasks that use media content.

      • getMediaStatus

        public <T extends Media> java.util.Collection<T> getMediaStatus(java.util.Collection<T> mediaList)
        retrieves the media status information for the list of media-items if available
        Parameters:
